Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1965...
Released by Pittsburgh on 3/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/2/1965 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/16/1966 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/25/1967 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 7/7/1969 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...

Injured on 6/21/1970 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Philadelphia on 1/31/1971 (Going to PHI: P J. Bibby, 3B B. Browne, P B. Veale. Going to NYM: P D. Siebler)...
Injured on 4/1/1971 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/10/1971, off Cecil Upshaw (NYM)...
Earned first career win on 6/16/1971...
